items.value: You can be my friend if you are nice!

you seem to be a cool Person!
I am searching for a smart Buddy...

Would you like to be my friend?
Sometimes i also could need your help!
cool hairs and yeh... tell me more
yes Kelly, we can be friends!
i need to think about it

More? *turning red*
We hardly know each other yet!

I'm a nice girl with lots of surprises!
And if we are friends we will have fun :)

Yipiiiiii * hug *
Uhh.. you may should take a shower!

Here take a wet Towel to clean yourself a little.
If you need a Job just come back to me!
I always need good fish for my store!

You got: 1x wet Towel, 10x Church Ticket
Thanks and see you soon Kelly!
